ExpSyntax.val: InStr ({1,2},'M')>0 AND {1,4}<>'Q' AND (VarMod ('{0,3}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,4}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,5}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,9}'VAR))

Text.val: Data has changed ... ask for confirmation
Data has not changed ... just exit

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{5,3}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,4}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,5}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{5,9}'VAR)
